description: Greaves constructed from the bones of ancient warriors, held together by necromantic magic. They provide exceptional protection and immunity to life-draining forces. Death knights and necromancer-lords wear such greaves, their legs armored in the remains of those who fell before them. The bones are eternally cold to the touch.
magicEffect: +2 AC, Immunity to necrotic damage, +2 Constitution
name: Boneguard Greaves
